subject: Baseball
World Series
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It turns out that the play that decided Game 3 of the World Series on Saturday night was a case of “obstruction,” not, as the official summary of the game said, an “interference error.”
snippet: It turns out that the play that decided Game 3 of the World Series on Saturday night was a case of “obstruction,” not, as the official summary of the game said, an “interference error.”
